title: 📜 Server Rules & Guidelines
description: 👋🏼 Welcome! To maintain a productive environment for debate and mingling, please follow the guidelines listed below 👇🏽

fields.name: **1: Be Respectful**
fields.value:
> Treat all members with respect. Harassment, hate speech, or discrimination will not be tolerated.
> - This includes abuse of media/bot permissions, spamming text, noise trolling, etc.

fields.name: **2: Discord ToS**
fields.value: > All activity on this server must comply with Discord's Terms of Service (ToS).

fields.name: **3: NSFW Content**
fields.value: > Pornography is prohibited outside of designated, age-restricted channels.

fields.name: **4: This server is 18+**
fields.value: > Anyone thought to be under 18 will be removed from the server.

fields.name: Enforcement:
fields.value: > Ultimately, we *aim* to be pretty self-governed. But, server Guides **will** utilize timeouts and bans to address continued or severe infractions of these guidelines.

fields.name: Roles
fields.value:
<@&1404602773538082986>
- Automatically assigned when you join the server.
- You can join VCs, but not create them, restricted media perms.

fields.name: ​
fields.value:
<@&1404604815153303713>
- Is the next level up
- You can post links, images, use external emoji, etc.

fields.name: ​
fields.value:
<@&1404607997631795271>
- Some wonderful people who help keep this server running smoothly
- Join this room to create your own custom room with mods

fields.name: 📺 Room Mod Overview
fields.value:
- A custom 'Create a Room' gives the creator mod abilities in that room, signified by the ✳️ next to their name
- The room moderators are able to give mod permissions to other room members, with a maximum of 2 (currently)
- If a mod leaves a room, they lose mods immediately
- Room mods are able to mute room members for 15sec at a time, with a 15sec cooldown between mutes
- If this mute does not suffice, a moderator can initiate a vote to mute and text-suppress a user for 2hrs

<@!1403843060856783043>
- Anyone with the <@&1404613451896062163> role can use AudioBot to play audio into the VC
- `/audiobot` for more information

fields.name: ​
fields.value:
<@!1404775842285883412>
- Use QuoteBot to commemorate those special moments with your pals 😉
